definitions.definition: A wide, flat board placed within, or forming part of the body of, a musical instrument in order to improve vibrations and increase volume.
A mixing console used to combine and blend different audio sources to a single output .
A control panel offering playback of various sound effects .

main_definition: ( music ) A wide, flat board placed within, or forming part of the body of, a musical instrument in order to improve vibrations and increase volume.
secondary_definitions: ( audio engineering ) A mixing console used to combine and blend different audio sources to a single output .
( Internet ) A control panel offering playback of various sound effects .
